thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sika AG says sales increase of more than 10 pct expected in 2018​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sika AG says sales increase of more than 10 pct expected in 2018​
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Sika AG:
* ‍A RECORD NET PROFIT FIGURE IS EXPECTED FOR 2017 FINANCIAL YEAR.​
* ‍SALES GROWTH OF 8.9% IN LOCAL CURRENCIES TO CHF 6.25 BILLION IN 2017​
* ‍ACCELERATED FOURTH-QUARTER GROWTH OF 12.0 PERCENT​ * - ‍FOR BUSINESS YEAR 2017, OPERATING PROFIT (EBIT) EXPECTED TO INCREASE AT HIGH RATE, REACHING BETWEEN CHF 880 MILLION AND 900 MILLION​
* ‍VOLATILE AND RISING COMMODITY PRICES WILL CONTINUE TO PRESENT A CHALLENGE IN CURRENT YEAR​
* IN ‍OUTLOOK 2018, SALES INCREASE OF MORE THAN 10% EXPECTED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
